h1.a: CAMPUS CLOSED AS OF MONDAY MARCH 16TH

div.class: css-901oao r-1fmj7o5 r-1qd0xha r-1blvdjr r-16dba41 r-ad9z0x r-bcqeeo r-19yat4t r-bnwqim r-qvutc0

span.class: css-901oao css-16my406 r-1qd0xha r-ad9z0x r-bcqeeo r-qvutc0

p.span: Consistent with sound science RTHS has been closed preventatively as of Monday March 16th and will remain closed until May 15th.

div.p: Students will work remotely during this period.

div.a: view press release for more details

p.span: You may still apply for admission but applications received will be placed on the wait list in the order they are received.

div.h2: Research Triangle High School provides globally competitive Science, Technology, Engineering and Math (STEM) education by pioneering models of teaching and learning.

div.class: et_pb_row et_pb_row_2 rths-offset-bottom rths-featured-row rths-shadow et_pb_equal_columns et_pb_gutters1

div.p: Our students learn in personalized and empowering environment.

div.p: Our parents are engaged and supported to help their students thrive.

div.div: Our teachers are leaders and life-long learners in STEM education.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_7 rths-grid-header et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_dark
et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_0 clearfix et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_icon_off et_pb_testimonial_no_image

div.p: I like being able to take notes on my own at home (while watching Flipped videos) because then I don’t have to slow down in class. I’m able to take in more information that way.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_1 clearfix et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_icon_off et_pb_testimonial_no_image

div.div: I’m comfortable here because I have teachers that care about me. I don’t feel left out…

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_2 clearfix et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_icon_off et_pb_testimonial_no_image

div.p: I like how they offer AP classes or options – we had AP Biology and AP World Civ last year (9th grade).

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_3 clearfix et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_icon_off et_pb_testimonial_no_image

div.div: I like RTHS because the labs and the hands-on activities we do in class are really fun.

div.h2:
Research Triangle High
is proud to be supported by

div.p: As an independent public charter high school, we are accountable to the state and the public for the success of our students. We’re accountable to our community to maintain an intentional, diverse and thriving educational environment with our personalized learning model.
Is RTHS right for your family?

3106 E. NC54, P.O. Box 13453,
Research Triangle Park, NC 27709
